info.name: Barrows Connected Stores Forum (v1.0)
info.description:
# Barrows Connected Stores API

Official API documentation for the Barrows forum application. This collection serves as the technical specification for the full-stack system.

## Getting Started
1.  **Environment:** Ensure the `base_url` variable is set to `http://127.0.0.1:8000`.
2.  **Authentication:** After a successful Login, the `token` variable will be automatically updated via the test script.
3.  **Roles:** The system supports Regular Users and Moderators.

item.name: 2. Forum Feed
item.description: Endpoints for retrieving and creating forum posts.

request.description:
### Get All Posts
Fetches the global feed of forum posts. This endpoint is accessible to anonymous users.
